title_advert: ['Exclusive! Freehold Beachfront Mansion Plot']
descriptions:
['DescriptionProperty Boutique is pleased to present this extraordinary beach mansion plot available for sale on Jumeirah Bay Island situated in the heart of Jumeirah. Sculpted in the shape of a seahorse and connected to Jumeirah Beach Road by a 300-meter bridge, this wonderful island will be home to 127 seafront mansions, The Bvlgari Hotel & Residences, A Marina and a Yacht Club. The Four Seasons Hotel is across the bridge from the island. This extravagant island is all set to become the most sought-after address in Dubai. 
The plot is 24,000 square feet overlooking a pristine white sandy beach. It offers sublime views of the sea and the impressive skyline of Downtown Dubai.
